Frank, it becomes on obsession, there is no hidding the fact, as I listen to evp from an investigation and try to cook a turkey.  oops if the turkey is a little dry, well my guests will understand!!!  
  

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
           I'm doing  this in between batches of bread, and cinamon rolls. I have only the front panel left. I do the same baking every hoiday. It usually means some all nighters.
 
 Frank-S
